scripts.dev:native: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS="--openssl-legacy-provider" nodemon server/index.js --watch server
scripts.dev:native:redis: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS="--openssl-legacy-provider" REDIS_URL=redis://localhost:6379 nodemon server/index.js --watch server
scripts.dev:rebuild: docker compose down && docker compose up --build
scripts.docker:clean: docker compose down -v && docker system prune -f
scripts.test: docker compose run --rm test npm run build
scripts.test:build: docker compose run --rm test npm run build
scripts.test:redis: docker compose run --rm test sh -c 'redis-cli -h redis ping && echo Redis connection successful'
